bibl.title: The Phantom Sister of Ptolemy Alexander.
bibl.note: About the mention in the stela Vienna, Kunsthistorisches Museum Stela 82, lines 9-10, of an otherwise unknown Ptolemaic princess, a "younger sister" of King Ptolemy (X) Alexander who had married into the Memphite aristocratic priestly family. - Proposes a more prosaic solution for lines 9-10.
bibl.seg: Cheshire Wendy, The Phantom Sister of Ptolemy Alexander.

About the mention in the stela Vienna, Kunsthistorisches Museum Stela 82, lines 9-10, of an otherwise unknown Ptolemaic princess, a "younger sister" of King Ptolemy (X) Alexander who had married into the Memphite aristocratic priestly family. - Proposes a more prosaic solution for lines 9-10.
